title: Game-Based Learning (GBL) Design Expert Course: Utilizing Card-Based Design Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic game design principles and elementary social studies curriculum content
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competencies for designing game-based learning in elementary social studies for professional practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can create a game design proposal that maps three or more learning objectives using game design cards based on the GBL framework (LEAGUE).
Learners can perform five or more iterations of idea refinement and improvement during collaborative processes with peers using card-based tools.
Learners can complete a prototype design document integrating social studies content and game mechanics (points, rewards, feedback, etc.) at a 3:1 ratio.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
